title: cmd/gc: bad checknil
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

Build http://play.golang.org/p/2QiHDmZAAh

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

Got: 

# command-line-arguments
checknil [7fff5fbfea00]
.   NAME-main.autotmp_0000 u(1) a(1) l(11) x(0+0) class(PAUTO) esc(N) int
./bcn.go:11: internal compiler error: bad checknil

Want: Nice, cheery panic.


Please use labels and text to provide additional information.

Reproduces with tip 5g and 8g. Does not reproduce with 1.2 or tip 6g.

Bumped into this while playing with issue #7370.
